h2_title: The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: Travel to the Longevity Road Keeper's Shrine and pan the camera left to find a path leading through the snow. Follow that path up a set of stairs, continuing through a wooden gate and up a second flight of stairs. The Luojia Fragrant Vine will be waiting on a tree straight ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Longevity Road Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
Travel to the Longevity Road Keeper's Shrine and pan the camera left to find a path leading through the snow. Follow that path up a set of stairs, continuing through a wooden gate and up a second flight of stairs. The Luojia Fragrant Vine will be waiting on a tree straight ahead.
